name: zirconium oxide production | zirconium oxide | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6788/documentation

In- and outputs of ZrSO4 and NaOH are calculated according to the stoechiometry. Process approximated with hydrothermal sodium silicate production and calcination of aluminium hydroxide to aluminium oxide. Weak data for energy consumption, wastes and emissions. Data partly based on a EMPA study, commissioned by the CEES.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



The process includes material and energy input, wastes and emissions for the production of zirconium oxide from zircon (ZrSiO4) using caustic fusion with sodium hydroxide. Transport and infrastructure are estimated.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Production in Australia considered. Data bases on similar European production processes.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Caustic fusion of zircon mineral (ZrSiO4) with sodium hydroxide to zirconium hydroxide. No allocation to sodium silicate by-product. Calcination of zirconium hydroxide to zirconium oxide.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: none This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography AU. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
